QpBound

Detailed Description

OOQP's solver for bound-constrained convex quadratic programs


  minimize    c' x + ( 1/2 ) x' * Q x         ; 
  subject to       l <= x <= u,

where l and u are vectors that may contain infinite elements (that is, upper and lower bounds need not exist for all components).

Generated on Wed Mar 22 13:58:35 2006 for OOQP by 1.3.5
